text:
@marklevinshow Malaria preventatives and treatment meds ARE NOT linked to being coronavirus medications. 

If you have an ingrown toenail and get it treated, 
THAT DOESN'T MEAN YOU WON'T HAPPEN TO GET A TOOTHACHE! 
Different things entirely. 

Trump HAS NO MEDICAL KNOWLEDGE. 

No common sense!
